Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
15.03.2009 GB SCR14400 Added the BID019D4 Store Unbooked invoices
23.06.20098 SH SCR13666 BID019D2 Extended test to perform module with
GSET_YESNO(122) = 'N' or PI.CCRY302_CONTINUOUS ='Y'
18.05.2007 SH SCR12546 BID019D2 Extended test to perform module with
GSET_YESNO(122) = 'N'
29.03.2007 SH SCR12392 BID019D1 Added part to update DUNI_INVOIVENO in
debtor language
30.03.2005 SH SCR8044 BID019D3 Extended update of INVO_LASTDUNLETTERDIFRECIP
if a new IDUN row was updated with BID019D2
14.12.2004 SH SCR7504 Added new argument for GB035 PO.EMAIL = skip
11.09.2004 JJ SCR7167 D3 Added update INVO_LASTDUNLETTERDIFRECIP
06.07.2004 SH SCR6389 BID019D2 "Reschedule risk analysis" --> Extended update of
IDUN_DUNNDATESCHED, see SCR for details
03.06.2004 SH SCR6337 Changed selection of IDUN in BID019D2 and extended CND
to perfrom BID019D2 and BID019D3, se SCR for details
03.06.2004 SH SCR6335 Removed BID019D0 from program
02.06.2004 SH SCR6337 Removed all changes
02.06.2004 SH SCR6337 BID019D2 Extened CND for update IDUN_DUNNDATEEFFECTIVE
with DUNL_LETTER = GSET_LETTERCODE (GSET_ID=33)
BID019D3 Added test for existing overdue invoices, if exists the the INVO update
has not to be performed
13.05.2004 SH SCR6223 BID019D2 Extended CND for the update of
IDUN_DUNNDATEEFFECTIVE with "or IDUN_DUNNDATESCHED > DUNL_DUNNINGDATE"
27.04.2004 SH SCR6104 BID019D2 Reduced CND to perform "update letter pair" to
- DULD_LETTERPAIR <> blank
27.04.2004 SH SCR6102 BID019D2 Update IDUN_DUNNDATESCHED with new parameter
PI.DUNNINGDATE (IDUN update) +14 now (see SCR for details)
23.03.2004 SH SCR5759 BID019D3 Changed CND to perfrom BID019D3
18.03.2004 SH SCR5739 BID019D2 Added new task "Update letter pair"
08.03.2004 SH SCR5670 Select new field DUNI_INVU_ID (segment of PK)
28.11.2003 SH SCR4899 BID019D2 Added update of DUNI_LETTER_UPDATED =
- IDUN_DUNNLETTER
10.11.2003 SH SCR4559 Fixed bug in module "Reschedule Risk analysis"
22.10.2003 JJ SCR4463 cont. fixed update of DUNI_INVA... fields
on 16.10.2003 SCR4463 implemented by Jin
15.10.2003 SH SCR4559 Added new parameters PI.DULD_PRINTINVOICES and
- PI.GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE and added task "Reschedule Risk Analysis"
- at the end of BID019D2 (before it was in BID007)
15.09.2003 JJ SCR4358 changed conditions of D2/D3
23.06.2003 SH SCR3843 Added new part BID019D0
19.05.2003 JJ SCR3570 altered condition on update IDUN (always for 'AV')
14.05.2003 JJ SCR3543 cont. added par PI.DULD_RECIPIENT + condition update IDUN
13.05.2003 JJ SCR3543 -set index on MF task BID019D2
In this case needed to ensure the first scheduled IDUN row is updated
- made all tasks resident (was: none)
- removed some indexes (main table, links) not needed for SQL
07.02.2003 SH SCR2886 Add new paramter PI.GNRL_LETTERCODRISCANALYSIS and
- changed updates of DUNI_CURRENCY and DUNI_ACCTUALI
07.01.2003 JJ SCR2755 dropped check on DUNI_AACTUALI > 0
PROGRAM --> "BID019D1 - Store DUNNING_LETTER_INVOICE"
-- Need to calculate totals which will be used in BID019
-- Values for DUNI in INVOICE currency regardless of use in client curr
-- Set in BID019_D2 and will be used for update in BID019_D3
... if letter is for debtor (recipient = 2) then the invoice number has to be
stored in debtor language
-- Calculate totals which will be used in BID019
... update invoice number in debtor language
@ Info: Only the first fetched IDUN row has to be updated, see also SORT
-- Uses in BID019_D3 (also as trigger, if <> empty for the updates in BID019D3)
-- Uses in T.S. to "Reschedule risk analysis"
-- Uses in T.S. to "Update letter pair"
-- Updates to DUNI
-- INDEX uses to fetch the row with the lowest DUNNDATESCHED
Part 1: If an IDUN row was updated with step BID019D2
Part 2: If no IDUN row was updated with step BID019D2
